briefdescription.para: Helper function to convert 0 or 1 to false or true.

parameterdescription.para: The integer representation of the boolean.

simplesect.para: The string representation (true or false) of the boolean.

memberdef.argsstring: (string host, string path, struct NWNX_WebHook_Message stMessage, int mrkdwn=1)
memberdef.name: NWNX_WebHook_BuildMessageForWebHook

briefdescription.para: Builds and sends a rich webhook message based on the constructed NWNX_WebHook_Message.

parameterdescription.para: The web server to send the hook.
Set to false if you do not wish your message's markdown be parsed.

simplesect.para: Your path must end with /slack if using a Discord webhook.

briefdescription.para: Create richer webhook messages suitable for Discord.
